name: Welltory
tagline: Stop energy drain
description: Wearables say you’re stressed and tired. Cool. Now what? Welltory analyzes 100+ biomarkers to show exactly when stress piles up and how to stop it – before you crash and burn. Identify your triggers, reverse the damage in minutes, and watch the stress curve drop in real time as you act. No 30-minute meditations. No diet overhaul. No long hours at the gym. Just well-timed actions based on YOUR body's data.

name: BeFreed
tagline: Learn anything with your own personal audio agent
description: BeFreed is a personal audio agent for learning. Unlike traditional platforms with fixed, predefined content, BeFreed connects to thousands of public and our own knowledge sources. Powered by our proprietary content model, it can search, analyze, and evaluate knowledge across them to deliver on-demand audio experience tailored to your needs. It answers your questions in real time, adapts to your learning style, and evolves with every interaction.

name: Paraflow
tagline: The canvas-based product design agent.
description: “Idea-to-app in minutes" sounds simple—until you try to build something real. Real products need structure, and Paraflow brings that to you, acting as an AI Product Design Agent that works like a full team. On one canvas, two AI minds — a product manager and a designer — work together to build structured specs that bridge ideas and code. With PRDs, user flows, and prototypes always aligned, you get richer specs, fewer prompts, and a build that stays well-controlled — and truly professional.

name: Reindeer
tagline: Cursor for databases
description: Reindeer is a Cursor-like IDE for databases. It understands your database schema, generates production-ready SQL in seconds, autocompletes, and fixes without ever leaving your IDE.

name: YourGPT 2.0
tagline: Powerful Conversational AI Agent Builder Platform
description: Introducing YourGPT 2.0 — the most powerful conversational AI agent builder yet. Build and deploy multimodal agents (text, voice, image) with zero code. Our AI Copilot builder creates workflows for you. Use native third party apps with 100+ tools integrations, explore the MCP marketplace, train from any source, and even launch PhoneAI agents — all in one platform. Scale with ease, from support to sales to ops.

name: sleek.design
tagline: Idea to mobile app designs in minutes
description: Go from mobile app idea to beautiful screens in minutes. Iterate and refine your designs by chatting. Export to Figma or code.

name: Anymark
tagline: Get data-backed logos and branding
description: Get a professional brand kit in minutes. Anymark combines research from 2,000+ tech brands, handcrafted logo design, and AI matching to give you logos and branding that work.

name: AI Website Builder by beehiiv
tagline: Build your website in minutes by simply chatting with AI.
description: Start with a prompt, then fine-tune everything in our drag-and-drop editor. You can even publish interactive components by simply describing what you want. We’ll automatically pull design context from your site, and you can upload images to guide layouts, components, and brand-matched copy.

name: Juice
tagline: Scale your product with short-form content that drives reach
description: Juice is a full-stack marketing AI, functioning as your fully managed marketing team of 10, 30 or 100 full-time AI employees – creating, posting and optimising organic content at scale on TikTok, Instagram, YouTube and LinkedIn. Once your Juice accounts are set up, Juice agents create, test, and distributes new short-form content about your product across your new account network. Every day, dozens of posts go live, each optimized algorithmic reach and driving organic reach for you, 24/7.

name: AppealSeal
tagline: Appeal your home's property tax in minutes to get a refund!
description: This is our first full launch! Until now, appealing your property taxes meant hiring an agency that took 30% of your savings or spending hours doing it yourself. AppealSeal makes the whole process effortless. With higher interest rates since the COVID years, it’s more important than ever for homeowners from the last 6–8 years to check if they’re overpaying. No one likes overpaying in taxes!

name: Sato Video Player
tagline: Build custom video players to match your UI without coding
description: Ditch third-party video players on your website. Build your own with Sato. 50+ customizations and cloud storage to ensure videos on your website gel with your design, just like you always wanted. Choose how your player components look and your video behave. Add your brand colors and logo. Sato is embed-ready, truly customizable.

name: Chat by X
tagline: DMs on X are now just "Chat"
description: X has replaced DMs with "Chat," an all-new secure messaging platform. It adds end-to-end encryption, file sharing, disappearing messages, the ability to edit/delete, and screenshot notifications. Rolling out now on iOS and Web.

name: Reviews by AlterBase
tagline: Find better software alternatives
description: Discover better alternatives to well-known software and tools. Compare features, pricing, and find the perfect tool for your needs. Submit and explore 1000+ alternatives.

name: Marginof.com
tagline: Discover the margin of the products you love.
description: Find the true price of the products you love by analyzing their margins. You can also put marginof.com/r/ in front of any product page to get analysis results.

name: VNYL
tagline: Truly unlimited podcast hosting
description: Modern podcast hosting with truly unlimited storage and downloads at a flat rate, no caps, no overage fees, no surprises. While competitors charge per download tier (forcing you to delete episodes or upgrade), we leverage modern cloud infrastructure to make unlimited genuinely affordable. Built-in team collaboration, IAB-compliant analytics, publish scheduling, and dedicated podcast website, all included.

name: NeoAgent
tagline: AI Agent to Automate Leads, Appointments & Customer Service
description: NeoAgent is an AI-powered business automation platform that lets you build a specialized virtual agent to interact with your customers 24/7 across multiple channels: Web Chat, WhatsApp, SMS, and Voice Chat. Ideal for anyone seeking a powerful alternative to common chatbots, NeoAgent stands out with its rare Voice AI capability and native automation for appointments and lead generation on popular channels like WhatsApp and Facebook.

name: Blimp
tagline: Productivity, AI Agents, Work
description: Blimp is the easiest way to automate your workflows — no code required. Connect apps, build powerful AI automations, and let Blimp handle the busywork. An n8n alternative built for non-technical users.

name: IntegrateAPI
tagline: Hand-crafted Next.js integration templates. Ready to ship.
description: Production-ready Next.js templates for 16 APIs: Stripe, Lemon Squeezy, Clerk, Auth0, Resend, SendGrid, Supabase, PlanetScale, OpenAI, Claude, PostHog, Sanity, Uploadthing, Meilisearch & more. Hand-crafted code with TypeScript, webhook handlers, and security hardening. Copy into your app and ship. Includes DevFinder Chrome extension to visually discover API endpoints on any website. Built by a developer who shipped 20 apps and got tired of rewriting integrations.

name: Wishfinity 3.0
tagline: Now with Full Gift Planning for Family, Friends, and Fans
description: Wishfinity was already the best wishlist app for collecting, sharing, and receiving your own wishes. But now 3.0 helps you organize gift lists and gift ideas for the family and friends you need to give presents for Christmas, Birthdays, and other special events. Easily create custom lists for each of your loved ones, fill them with the gifts you're considering from any retailer in the universe, and track your progress as you go. Best of all, it's completely free. Happy Holidays!

name: Stage
tagline: browser canvas editor that brings your ideas to life
description: Create stunning showcase images for your projects with customizable templates and layouts. A fully in-browser canvas editor for adding images, text, and backgrounds no external services required.

tagline: Stop energy drain
